title: Long Sans Serif on DesignEmbraced.com
content:
I'm trying to find out what the gorgeous typeface on Designembraced.com logo and web is. I've been looking at the code but can't seem to find what it is... Any ideas?

Thank you very much in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072113im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Captura%20de%20pantalla%202014-03-03%20a%20la(s)%2011_5662.48.17.png)

Font: 

 Kelson Sans 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072113/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Ordozgoiti

comments.content:
Yup, that's it. I had found the regular Kelson but the B didn't match. But it's definitely Kelson Sans.

Thanks!
